IPL98 ANSI C Modules

Here is a list of all modules:
  • Class Coordinate Transformation
  • Class Feature extraction
  • Class Graphics
  • Class Local operations
  • Class Mask operations
  • Class Morphology
  • Class Perspective
  • Class Segmentate
  • Class Spectral
  • Class Statistic container
  • Class ByteImage
    • ByteImage C only
  • Class ComplexImage
    • ComplexImage C only
  • Class FloatImage
    • FloatImage C only
  • Class Image
    • Image C only
  • Class IntImage
    • IntImage C only
  • IPL98 Global C and C++ enums, definitions, structs etc.
    • IPL98 Macro definitions with the #define directive (global)
    • IPL98 Type enumerations and definitions (global)
      • IPL98 Abstract types (global)
      • IPL98 Value types (global)
      • IPL98 Bool, true and false for C only
  • IPL98 Global C only enums, definitions, structs etc.
    • IPL98 2D and 3D structures (global)
  • Class Corresponding 3D-2D points.
  • Error and warning handling by IPL98.
  • Variables and functions for working with the history
  • File related functions
  • Class Palette
  • Class Pixel group container.
    • Fast functions, no updating of boundaries!
  • Class Pixel groups container.
  • Class String container.
  • Class IplText
  • Class TimeDate Timer and time/date functionality,
